label: سُبْحَانَ اللّٰهِ
translation: Glory be to Allah.

label: ٱلْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ
translation: All praise is for Allah.

label: اللّٰهُ أَكْبَرُ
translation: Allah is the Greatest.

label: لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا اللّٰهُ
translation: There is no god except Allah.

label: سُبْحَانَ اللّٰهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ
translation: Glory and praise be to Allah.

label: سُبْحَانَ اللّٰهِ الْعَظِيمِ
translation: Glory be to Allah, the Most Great.

label: لَا حَوْلَ وَلَا قُوَّةَ إِلَّا بِاللّٰهِ
translation: There is no power nor strength except through Allah.

label: حَسْبِيَ اللّٰهُ لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ
translation: Allah is sufficient for me; there is no god except Him.

label: اللّٰهُمَّ صَلِّ عَلَىٰ مُحَمَّدٍ
translation: O Allah, send blessings upon Muhammad (PBUH).

label: سُبْحَانَ اللّٰهِ وَالْحَمْدُ لِلّٰهِ
translation: Glory be to Allah and all praise is for Allah.

label: سُبْحَانَ اللّٰهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ، سُبْحَانَ اللّٰهِ الْعَظِيمِ
translation: Glory and praise be to Allah; Glory be to Allah, the Most Great.

label: رَبِّ اغْفِرْ لِي
translation: My Lord, forgive me.

label: اللّٰهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ الْعَفْوَ وَالْعَافِيَةَ
translation: O Allah, I ask You for pardon and well-being.

label: يَا رَبِّ لَكَ الْحَمْدُ
translation: O my Lord, all praise belongs to You.

label: اللّٰهُمَّ اغْفِرْ لِي ذَنْبِي
translation: O Allah, forgive my sin.

label: سُبْحَانَ اللّٰهِ عَدَدَ خَلْقِهِ
translation: Glory be to Allah as many times as His creation.

label: اللّٰهُمَّ أَنْتَ رَبِّي لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ
translation: O Allah, You are my Lord; there is no god except You.

label: رَضِيتُ بِاللّٰهِ رَبًّا
translation: I am pleased with Allah as my Lord.

label: سُبْحَانَ اللّٰهِ وَاللّٰهُ أَكْبَرُ
translation: Glory be to Allah, and Allah is the Greatest.

label: اللّٰهُمَّ ارْحَمْنِي
translation: O Allah, have mercy on me.

label: يَا حَيُّ يَا قَيُّومُ
translation: O Ever-Living, O Sustainer.

label: اللّٰهُمَّ اهْدِنِي
translation: O Allah, guide me.

label: سُبْحَانَكَ اللّٰهُمَّ وَبِحَمْدِكَ
translation: Glory and praise be to You, O Allah.

label: اللّٰهُمَّ زِدْنِي عِلْمًا
translation: O Allah, increase me in knowledge.

label: اللّٰهُمَّ اشْرَحْ لِي صَدْرِي
translation: O Allah, expand my chest.

label: اللّٰهُمَّ إِنِّي تَوَكَّلْتُ عَلَيْكَ
translation: O Allah, I place my trust in You.

label: اللّٰهُمَّ قَرِّبْنِي إِلَيْكَ
translation: O Allah, draw me closer to You.

label: اللّٰهُمَّ اجْعَلْنِي مِنَ الصَّالِحِينَ
translation: O Allah, make me among the righteous.

label: اللّٰهُمَّ ثَبِّتْ قَلْبِي عَلَىٰ دِينِكَ
translation: O Allah, keep my heart firm upon Your religion.

label: آيَةُ الْكُرْسی
translation: Allah — there is no god except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of all.

label: قُلْ هُوَ اللَّهُ أَحَد
translation: Say: He is Allah, the One.

label: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ الْفَلَق
translation: Say: I seek refuge in the Lord of the dawn.

label: قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِ
translation: Say: I seek refuge in the Lord of mankind.

label: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
translation: There is no god except Allah alone, without partner. To Him belongs the kingdom and all praise, and He has power over all things.

label: رَضِيتُ بِاللَّهِ رَبًا وَ بِالْإِسْلَامِ دِينًا وَ بِمُحَمَّدٍ نَّبِيَّا
translation: I am pleased with Allah as my Lord, with Islam as my religion, and with Muhammad as my Prophet.

label: بسْمِ اللهِ الَّذِي لَا يَفُرُ مَعَ اسْمِهِ شَيْءٍ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَا فِي السَّمَاءِ وَهُوَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيم
translation: In the name of Allah, with whose name nothing on earth or in the heavens can cause harm, and He is the All-Hearing, All-Knowing.

label: اعُوذُ بِكَلِمَاتِ اللَّهِ التَّمَاتِ مِنْ شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
translation: I seek refuge in the perfect words of Allah from the evil of what He has created.

label: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ وَبِحَمْدِهِ عَدَدَ خَلْقِهِ وَرِضَى نَفْسِهِ وَزِنَةً عَرْشِهِ وَ مِدَادَ كَلِمَاتِهِ
translation: Glory be to Allah and all praise is His, as many times as His creation, as much as pleases Him, equal to the weight of His Throne, and equal to the ink of His words.

label: اسْتَغْفِرُ الهُ الَّذِي لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا هُوَ الْحَيَ الْقَيُّومُ وَاتُوبُ إِلَيْهِ
translation: I seek forgiveness from Allah, besides whom there is no god, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer, and I repent to Him.

label: اللَّهُمَّ أَجِرْنِي مِنَ النَّارِ
translation: O Allah, protect me from the Fire.

label: اللَّهُم بِكَ أَصْبَحْنَا وَبِكَ أَمْسَيْنَا أَمْسَيْنَا وَبِكَ اصْبَحْنَا (وَبِكَ نَحْيَا وَبِكَ تَمُوْتُ وَإِلَيْكَ الْمَصِيرُ وَإِلَيْكَ النُّهُورُ(
translation: O Allah, by You we enter the morning and by You we enter the evening. By You we live and by You we die, and to You is the return and the resurrection.

label: يَا حَيُّ يَا قَيُّومُ بِرَحْمَتِكَ اسْتَغِيثُ أَصْلِحْ لِي شَأْنِي كُلَّهُ وَلَا تَكِلْنِي إِلَى نَفْسِي طَرْفَةَ عَيْنٍ
translation: O Ever-Living, O Self-Sustaining, by Your mercy I seek help. Rectify all of my affairs and do not leave me to myself even for the blink of an eye.

label: سُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ وَبِحَمَّدِه
translation: Glory be to Allah, and all praise is for Him.

label: أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللَّهَ وَأَتُوبُ إِلَيْه
translation: I seek forgiveness from Allah and I repent to Him.

label: لَاحَوْلَ وَلَا قَوَّةً إِلَّا بِاللَّه
translation: There is no power and no strength except with Allah.

label: حَسْبُنَا اللَّهُ وَنِعْمَ الْوَكِيلُ
translation: Allah is sufficient for us, and He is the best Disposer of affairs.

label: أَسْتَغْفِرُ اللّٰهَ
translation: I seek forgiveness from Allah.

label: اللَّهُمَّ أَنْتَ السَّلَامُ وَمِنْكَ السَّلَامُ، تَبَارَكْتَ يَا ذَا الْجَلَالِ وَالْإِكْرَامِ
translation: O Allah, You are Peace and from You comes peace. Blessed are You, O Possessor of majesty and honor.

label: آيَةُ الْكُرْسی
translation: Allah — there is no god except Him, the Ever-Living, the Sustainer of all.

label: رَبِّ قِنِي عَذَابَكَ يَوْمَ تَبْعَثُ عِبَادَكَ
translation: My Lord, protect me from Your punishment on the Day You resurrect Your servants.

label: رَبِّ أَعِنِّي عَلَى ذِكْرِكَ وَشُكْرِكَ وَحُسْنِ عِبَادَتِكَ
translation: My Lord, help me to remember You, to thank You, and to worship You in the best manner.

label: رَبَّنَا آتِنَا فِي الدُّنْيَا حَسَنَةً وَفِي الْآخِرَةِ حَسَنَةً وَقِنَا عَذَابَ النَّارِ
translation: Our Lord, grant us good in this world and good in the Hereafter, and protect us from the punishment of the Fire.

label: لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ وَحْدَهُ لَا شَرِيكَ لَهُ، لَهُ الْمُلْكُ وَلَهُ الْحَمْدُ، وَهُوَ عَلَى كُلِّ شَيْءٍ قَدِيرٌ
translation: There is no god except Allah alone, without partner. To Him belongs the dominion and all praise, and He has power over all things.

label: اللَّهُمَّ لَا مَانِعَ لِمَا أَعْطَيْتَ، وَلَا مُعْطِيَ لِمَا مَنَعْتَ، وَلَا يَنْفَعُ ذَا الْجَدِّ مِنْكَ الْجَدُّ
translation: O Allah, none can withhold what You give, and none can give what You withhold, and no wealth or status can benefit its owner against You.

label: سُبْحَانَكَ اللَّهُمَّ وَبِحَمْدِكَ، أَشْهَدُ أَنْ لَا إِلَهَ إِلَّا أَنْتَ، أَسْتَغْفِرُكَ وَأَتُوبُ إِلَيْكَ
translation: Glory is Yours, O Allah, and praise is Yours. I bear witness that there is no god except You. I seek Your forgiveness and I repent to You.

label: اللَّهُمَّ إِنِّي أَسْأَلُكَ عِلْمًا نَافِعًا، وَرِزْقًا طَيِّبًا، وَعَمَلًا مُتَقَبَّلًا
translation: O Allah, I ask You for beneficial knowledge, pure provision, and accepted deeds.

label: سُبْحَانَ الْمَلِكِ الْقُدُّوسِ
translation: Glory be to the Sovereign, the Most Pure.

label: رَبُّ الْمَلَائِكَةِ وَالرُّوحِ
translation: Lord of the angels and the Spirit (Jibreel).
